mdRecord.dcterms:title: Elder Posey Lester
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 904_Elder Posey Lester; Cabinet card portait of Posey Green Lester. Elder P. G. Lester, US Congress, 5th district, 1888, two terms; original President Peoples Bank 1890, Mayor, Town of Floyd, President Mutual Benefit Fire Insurance
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
